title: Spacious Two Bedroom Apartment Available Now!
posting_body: Burst into a life of walkable excitement and inspiration at Bell South City.
In beautiful South San Francisco, our definition of the perfect location means easy access to dining, coffee, retail, and major commuting thoroughfares.
During the work day, take Caltrain, US 101, I-380, or Oyster Point shuttles to get where you’re going, and in the evening step outside to fun.
Satisfy your inner foodie with flavors like Restorante Buon Gusto, Amami San, and Flavas Jamaican Grill.
Satisfy your spirit with local parks, trails, and golf courses.
Everything is here.
Each 1, 2, or 3 bedroom townhome or apartment home is its own sanctuary of good living.

With ecoQuartz countertops, stainless-steel ENERGY STAR appliances, high-efficiency central heat and air conditioning, and oversized, energy-efficient, sound-dampening windows, we’ve made it easy to indulge the guilt-free best.
Fiber internet, walk-in closets, and private balconies with gorgeous views just make it just all that much better.
Bell South City thought of it all.
This isn’t your average amenity package – ingenious spaces await you from the Creative Maker Space to the musically inspired Jam Café.
You can work out, play, be productive, hang with friends, and make the absolute best of life all without leaving the community.
Relax in the luxe rooftop lounge overlooking nearby San Bruno Mountain and San Francisco Bay.
Take your pup for a scrub-up in the dog spa.
Arrange a night in at the gameroom with poker, foosball, and table shuffleboard.
However you design your day, it’s going to be great.
-Pantry
-Private balconies and patios
-Flexible Lease Terms Available
-Granite Countertops

-Hardwood-style plank flooring throughout living areas
